content.1: And there was a great cry of the people and of their wives against their brethren the Jews.
content.2: For there were that said, We, our sons, and our daughters,
content.4: There were also that said, We have borrowed money for the king’s tribute,
content.6: And I was very angry when I heard their cry and these words.
content.7: Then I consulted with myself, and I rebuked the nobles, and the rulers, and said unto them, Ye exact usury, every one of his brother. And I set a great assembly against them.
content.8: And I said unto them, We after our ability have redeemed our brethren the Jews, which were sold unto the heathen; and will ye even sell your brethren? or shall they be sold unto us? Then held they their peace, and found nothing
